item.title: Kathy add a quote by Edward Albee
item.description: "What I mean by an educated taste is someone who has the same tastes that I have." -- Edward Albee

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Isadora Duncan
item.description: "You were once wild here. Donâ€™t let them tame you." -- Isadora Duncan

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Joyce Carol Oates
item.description: "I never change, I simply become more myself." -- Joyce Carol Oates

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Philip Barry
item.description: "The time to make up your mind about people, is never." -- Philip Barry

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Nora Ephron
item.description: "I love that you get cold when it's 71 degrees out. I love that it takes you an hour and a half to order a sandwich. I love that you get a little crinkle above your nose when you're looking at me like I'm nuts. I love that after I spend the day with you, I can still smell your perfume on my clothes. And I love that you are the last person I want to talk to before I go to sleep at night. And it's not because I'm lonely, and it's not because it's New Year's Eve. I came here tonight because when you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible." -- Nora Ephron

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Jack London
item.description: "I'd rather sing one wild song and burst my heart with it, than live a thousand years watching my digestion and being afraid of the wet." -- Jack London

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Sylvia Townsend Warner
item.description: "It is best as one grows older to strip oneself of possessions, to shed oneself downward like a tree, to be almost wholly earth before one dies." -- Sylvia Townsend Warner

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Martin Amis
item.description: "Style is not neutral; it gives moral directions." -- Martin Amis
